_header: As I went through a garden green
_description: Verbum caro factum est, the Virgin Mary’s song of the Nativity — seven 8-line stanzas including this Latin refrain

NLS1931.First Lines:
aS I paddis þoru a garden greneI fond a herbere made full
                    newe…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…ffor I hard when sche sange & saidVerbum caro factum
                        est
